name: gitbook-plugin-baidu-tongji-with-multiple-channel
description: Gitbook 百度统计插件,支持多渠道独立统计,一份源码多处部署独立统计.

token.description: 用户在百度统计中新增网站后生成的token

type.title: render type
type.description: some supported methods such as markdown or console or html

method.title: jsbaidu-tongji-with-multiple-channel api method
method.description: some supported methods such as baidu-tongji-with-multiple-channelChars or baidu-tongji-with-multiple-channelWords or baidu-tongji-with-multiple-channelWordsWithSpace or baidu-tongji-with-multiple-channelLines or baidu-tongji-with-multiple-channelTrimmedLines or baidu-tongji-with-multiple-channelSentences or baidu-tongji-with-multiple-channelJson or baidu-tongji-with-multiple-channelArrays

options.title: jsbaidu-tongji-with-multiple-channel api options
options.description: some methods may not support options
